title: DETOX Essential Oil Roll-On
description: Cleanse & purify your body naturally. Help eliminate toxins naturally with this 100% natural essential oil roll-on blend of Cardamom, Lavender, Peppermint & Ginger. Pre-blended with 100% natural beauty carrier oils. Jet set and ready to roll. 5ml. Benefits: restorative, balancing & cleansing. Scent: sweet
